Package com.jalios.jcms.portlet

Contains core Portlets parent of all generated portlets.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FullDisplay  
    Parent  
    PortalInterface
    This interface represent a Portal for redirection or display.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AJAXPortalManager
    This class is a JSON Bridge used to access PortalManager method using ajax.
    DisplayContext  
    EditPortalElementHandler  
    EditPortalHandler  
    EditPortalRedirectHandler  
    EditPortletCollectionHandler  
    EditPortletHandler  
    EditPortletLogHandler  
    EditPortletParentHandler  
    EditPortletSkinableHandler  
    Portal
    An abstract Portal representation with fields to implements - String -> CSSFile - String -> Header - String -> Footer - Publication -> Child
    PortalElement  
    PortalElement.AbilitySelector
    AbilitySelector selects all the publications with the given ability
    PortalManager
    Manager for Portals that handle used classses, their associated images and manage lots of general features around PortalElement.
    PortalManager.CatDiscrimComparator
    This inner class compare two categories.
    PortalManager.DisplayContextParameters
    A structure to handle method parameters
    PortalRedirect
    An abstract Portal representation with fields to implements.
    Portlet
    An abstract Portlet représentation with fields to implements
    PortletCollection
    An abstract PortletCollection représentation with fields to implements - PortalElement[] -> Children
    PortletParent
    An abstract PortletParent représentation with fields to implements - Publication -> Children
    PortletQueryForeachDataController
    Check the PortletQueryForeach options when JcmsDB search has been enabled.
    PortletSkinable
    An abstract Portlet représentation with fields to implements - String -> DisplayTitle (ML) - String -> SkinTemplate - String -> SkinCSS
    PortletSkinable.ContentTitleComparator<T extends Publication>
    Sort the Publication according to their title, but using the display title for Portlet if available.
    PortletSkinable.PortletSkinableTitleComparator<T extends PortletSkinable>
    Sort the PortletSkinable according to their display title.

Package com.jalios.jcms.portlet Description

Contains core Portlets parent of all generated portlets.
